concept.definition: Only process this rule for the first in the list.
Process this rule for all but the first.
Only process this rule for the last in the list.
Process this rule for all but the last.
Only process this rule is there is only item.

description: If field is a list, how to manage the source.
name: StructureMapSourceListMode

text.div:
StructureMapSourceListMode

If field is a list, how to manage the source.

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/map-source-list-mode defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
first FirstOnly process this rule for the first in the list.
not_first All but the firstProcess this rule for all but the first.
last LastOnly process this rule for the last in the list.
not_last All but the lastProcess this rule for all but the last.
only_one Enforce only oneOnly process this rule is there is only item.

title: StructureMapSourceListMode
